General.Name: NanJi ECommerce Co Ltd
General.Description: NanJi E-Commerce Co., LTD provides brand authorization, retail, and mobile Internet marketing services in China. It offers men's, women's, and children's wear and clothing products; underwears, mother and baby products, healthy life solutions, etc. The company also provides home textiles, fabrics, luggage accessories, shoes, glasses, and watches; and bedding, stationery, and leather products. In addition, it offers products in food, housing, transportation, education, and entertainment categories, as well as park platform services; and engages in factoring business. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Xinmin Textile Science & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NanJi E-Commerce Co., LTD in March 2016. NanJi E-Commerce Co., LTD was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
